body_html:
Ah, sorry this is weird
feature_columns = [tf.feature_column.indicator_column(x) for x in columns]
You seem to be creating an indicator over bucketized columns as well. This is not needed. Also, to narrow down

  1. Can you first try just with bucketized feature columns b_bucket, d_bucket (no indicator over them)
  2. Then add the categorical with an indicator

body:
Ah, sorry this is weird
feature_columns = [tf.feature_column.indicator_column(x) for x in columns]
You seem to be creating an indicator over bucketized columns as well. This is not needed. Also, to narrow down
1) Can you first try just with bucketized feature columns b_bucket, d_bucket (no indicator over them)
2) Then add the categorical with an indicator
